name: Dots
description:
Dots - is an exciting and amazing puzzle game, in which you need to consistently connect points, creating a variety of figures. The rules are easy: connect all points and draw figures with one touch, don’t go through the same line twice, if the task doesn’t require it. Be clever and quick to get the highest mark! Connect the dots faster! Than less time you spend on passing through the level, the more you earn the stars.

Features:

- 3 worlds;
- 48 puzzles with increasing difficulty level;
- Simple operation;
- Exciting game-play;
- Beautiful artistic style;
- Relaxation music;
- Steam Achievements.
